title: Gaza-Egypt Crossing Is Reopening for Limited Passage of People
description: The Rafah crossing between Gaza and Egypt is reopening for the limited passage of people in both directions, as part of US President Donald Trump’s 20-point peace plan to end the war between Israel and Hamas and rebuild the territory.
content: The Rafah crossing between Gaza and Egypt is reopening for the limited passage of people in both directions, as part of US President Donald Trump’s 20-point peace plan to end the war between Israel and Hamas and rebuild the territory.
